content: {"locationId": "8922", "organizationId": "7359", "name": "Cole Community Center Resource Hub", "address1": "4400 NW Expressway", "address2": "", "city": "Oklahoma City", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "73116", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "35.53928", "longitude": "-97.59893", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "CITY:  Oklahoma City", "languages": "English", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Hope Box is a FREE food pantry  that operates in the community for the community on Fridays at The Cole Community Center (an extension of OKC First).  The Hope Box serves the community 1:00pm-2:00pm every week .  We are a client choice model food pantry  -where neighbors can come inside and shop for items they need and prefer.  N  eighbors are allowed to come shop 2x a month . Right now we are able to sustain ourselves as a food pantry through generous donations from our community. This year we have also qualified as a USDA pantry. When neighbors come we do require that you fill out our intake form so we can continue to qualifying for more food to serve our community through the USDA program.   If you have an questions please email our Community Liaison Jayden Oliver at Jayden@okcfirst.com.           The Hope Box food pantry is located inside of the Cole Community Center Resource Hub.  The Cole Community Center is located behind OKC First. When you turn into 4400 NW Expressway, your going to drive towards the back of the location, passing the first car port you see. Continue towards the back and you will see The Cole Community Center to your right.  The Hope Box entrance is to the right of The Cole Community Center main doors.   You will enter where our Hope Box sign is located. Doors open at 1:00pm and stay open until 2:00pm.", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": null, "contactEmail": "jayden@okcfirst.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Indoor Service, Shopper Choice", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 64, "regionName": "Regional Food Bank of Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "b268ff1b-39fa-45f4-a37e-421975c3f339.png", "website": "https://www.regionalfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Friday 1:00 PM-2:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": [{"locationSpecialHoursId": 8646, "locationId": 8922, "specialDate": "2025-11-21T00:00:00", "startTime": null, "endTime": null, "startTimeDescr": null, "endTimeDescr": null, "closedInd": true, "notes": "", "addDateTime": "2025-04-02T19:40:29.713", "addUserName": "jayden@okcfirst.com", "updateDateTime": null, "updateUserName": null}, {"locationSpecialHoursId": 8647, "locationId": 8922, "specialDate": "2025-12-26T00:00:00", "startTime": null, "endTime": null, "startTimeDescr": null, "endTimeDescr": null, "closedInd": true, "notes": "", "addDateTime": "2025-04-02T19:40:29.737", "addUserName": "jayden@okcfirst.com", "updateDateTime": null, "updateUserName": null}]}
